body_html:
I'm not sure this is worth it, since it makes the code more complicated. We still have to wrap indices if they're not the result of a nonzero, which is much more common.

We need to speed up advanced indexing, but that's going to be a more substantial change.

body:
I'm not sure this is worth it, since it makes the code more complicated. We still have to wrap indices if they're not the result of a nonzero, which is much more common.

We need to speed up advanced indexing, but that's going to be a more substantial change.
